input_text.Prompt:
Using the product keywords and product name, write a copy that follows the AIDA framework (Attention, Interest, Desire, Action) for a product or service. The copy should be concise, catchy, and persuasive.

Product name:
Mini-Factory Pink Strap Charm Lariat Lanyard W/ Lobster Clasp Cords for Cellphone/ USB Drive/ Keychain / DIY Jewelry - Hot Pink(Length:2.8", QTY:200X Pcs)

Product keywords:
Charm Straps for Cellphone, USB Drive, Keychain, Name Tag, Trinkets, Decoration for Handmade Jewelry Accessories.
Lightweight and easy to Connect Cords Strap Lariat Lanyard with Lobster Clasp, easy to attach / detach.
Decorate your Mobile Phone / Camera / iPod / Mp3 / Mp4 / USB Flash Drive with the Colorful Fashionable Straps.
Excellent DIY Accessory String Strap Gift.
Package included 200X Pieces of Hot Pink Strap. Item Size: 2.8".

Product description:
input_text.Response A: A great value, this package contains 200 pieces of the Mini-Factory pink strap charm lariat lanyard with a lobster clasp for cellphone, USB drive, keychain, name tag, or trinkets. Ideal for decorating your mobile phone, camera, iPod, mp3, mp4, or USB flash drive, the lightweight and easy to connect cords strap lariat lanyard can be easily attached or detached with the lobster clasp. The attractive, colorful, and fashionable straps are easy to use and can be cut to any desired length. Each strap has a charm at each end. The item size is 2.8".
input_text.Response B:
(Attention) Mini-Factory Pink Strap Charm Lariat Lanyard W/ Lobster Clasp Cords for Cellphone/ USB Drive/ Keychain is a great way to customize your favorite gadgets! With so many colors and styles, you can create a personalized and unique look for your phone, USB drive, key chain, or any other tech accessory. 

(Interest) This Cellphone Strap has been specially designed for you: It is Lightweight and easy to Connect Cords Strap Lariat Lanyard with Lobster Clasp, easy to attach / detach. You can take your cellphone, USB drive, or any other tech accessory anywhere and you won't have to worry about dropping it or losing it. 

(Desire) Decorate your Mobile Phone / Camera / iPod / Mp3 / Mp4 / USB Flash Drive with the Colorful Fashionable Straps. It is so many colors and styles to choose from, you'll never get bored.

(Action) Excellent DIY Accessory String Strap Gift. Use your imagination and make your own DIY necklace, bracelet, keychain, etc.

(Conclusion) Package included 200X Pieces of Hot Pink Strap. Item Size: 2.8". Don't miss the chance!

label_annotations.factors_a: No, I used the prompts provided.
label_annotations.factors_b: No, I used the prompts provided.
label_annotations.feedback: Answer B actually used the words: "Attention, Interest, Desire, Action" in the reply!
